data.text:
Torrent Power Ltd. Financials: Check Share Price, Balance Sheet, Annual Report and Quarterly Results for Company Analysis

Torrent Power Ltd. is a leading power utility company in India that has been providing reliable and efficient power supply to its customers for over four decades. For long-term stock investors, it is important to analyze the company's performance and financials to make informed investment decisions. We will discuss Torrent Power Ltd.'s stock analysis page and its various aspects.

Torrent Power Ltd. Share Price

The share price of Torrent Power Ltd. is an important factor to consider when analyzing the company's performance. It reflects the market's perception of the company's future prospects. Our pre-built screening tools allow investors to track the company's share price and its movement over time. This tool is useful in identifying trends and patterns in the share price.

Torrent Power Ltd. Balance Sheet

The balance sheet of Torrent Power Ltd. provides insights into the company's financial health. It shows the company's assets, liabilities, and equity at a given point in time. Ticker premium features allow investors to perform fair value calculations using tools like DCF Analysis, BVPS Analysis, Earnings multiple approach, and DuPont analysis. These tools help investors to understand the company's financials and make informed investment decisions.

Torrent Power Ltd. Annual Report

The annual report of Torrent Power Ltd. is a comprehensive document that provides detailed information about the company's performance, financials, and future plans. Ticker provides a downloadable version of the annual report, which investors can use to analyze the company's performance over the years. The report also provides insights into the company's strategy and future growth plans.

Dividends are an important source of income for long-term investors. Torrent Power Ltd. has a track record of paying regular dividends to its shareholders. Our pre-built screening tools allow investors to track the company's dividend history and its payout ratio. This tool is useful in identifying trends and patterns in the company's dividend payouts.

These tools help investors to understand the company's financials and make informed investment decisions.

The presentations also provide insights into the company's strategy and future growth plans.

Torrent Power Ltd. Promoters

The promoters of Torrent Power Ltd. are the people who founded the company and hold a significant stake in it. Ticker provides information about the company's promoters and their background. This information is useful in understanding the company's ownership structure and management team.

Torrent Power Ltd. Shareholders

The shareholders of Torrent Power Ltd. are the people who own a stake in the company. Ticker provides information about the company's major shareholders and their holdings. This information is useful in understanding the company's ownership structure and the level of institutional ownership.

Torrent Power Ltd. ROCE

Return on Capital Employed (ROCE) is a key financial ratio that assesses a company's profitability and efficiency in utilizing its invested capital. By measuring the returns generated in proportion to the capital employed, ROCE provides insights into the company's financial health. For the ROCE data of Torrent Power Ltd., please refer to the financials table or ratio section provided above.

Torrent Power Ltd. EBITDA

EBITDA, or Earnings Before Interest, Taxes, Depreciation, and Amortization, is a metric used to evaluate a company's operating performance. By excluding non-operating expenses, EBITDA provides a clearer picture of a company's profitability from core operations. To obtain the EBITDA data for Torrent Power Ltd., refer to the financials table or ratio section on this page.

Torrent Power Ltd. DPS

Dividends Per Share (DPS) measures the amount of dividends paid to each shareholder for every share owned. DPS is an important indicator of a company's willingness to distribute profits to its shareholders. For the DPS data of Torrent Power Ltd., please refer to the financials table or ratio section featured above.

Torrent Power Ltd. EPS

Earnings Per Share (EPS) is a widely used financial ratio that indicates the portion of a company's profit allocated to each outstanding share. EPS is crucial for investors as it helps determine the value of a stock and allows for comparison across different companies. To find the EPS data of Torrent Power Ltd., refer to the financials table or ratio section provided on this page.
